abstract: As its home market slows, the Anglo-Dutch firm is looking to emerging countries, agreeing to buy an 82 percent stake in Russian cosmetics brand Concern Kalina for $537 million.
snippet: As its home market slows, the Anglo-Dutch firm is looking to emerging countries, agreeing to buy an 82 percent stake in Russian cosmetics brand Concern Kalina for $537 million.
lead_paragraph: With Western economies struggling to avoid a double-dip recession, European consumer product's giant Unilever is heading East.
